attributes.action: use the existing driving license as the National ID
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should we recreate the wheel? Most people in the UK have a driving license which already carries a photo. Why is this not changed into a national ID card for all new issues. This would slowly give people an ID card and would be implemented over a period of time. This has already happened with the photo driving license as the majority of drivers now have this kind of license.
